message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $85 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $90.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal!
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $87? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to get the best deal possible.
